ygData.subject: RE: Location of High Quality Firing sheets
ygData.msgSnippet: Next closest I would say is Misty Thicket, but maybe there is a place in Highpass Hold too.  Be sure to check that web site, it is perfect for finding what you
ygData.messageBody:
Next closest I would say is Misty Thicket, but maybe there is a place in
Highpass Hold too. Be sure to check that web site, it is perfect for
finding what you need.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kazen, Marc [mailto:Marc.Kazen@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 10:08 AM
To: 'EQ_Potters@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Location of High Quality Firing sheets


From: "Kazen, Marc" <Marc.Kazen@...>

Thanks for everyone's help with this. I have to be careful going to that
hut, since a Freeport Militia guard hangs out there and I'm KOS for them.
I'll have to ask a friend to go there. Where is the next closest location?
Also, if I ever figure out how to make a deity, I'll let everyone know.
Thanks!

Zopo on E'Ci
Master Baker
Apprentice Potter

-----Original Message-----
From: Truitt, Darla/SEA [mailto:dtruitt@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 11:43 AM
To: 'EQ_Potters@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Location of High Quality
Firing sheets

From: "Truitt, Darla/SEA" <dtruitt@...>

http://www.eqtraders.com/

You can find everything you need here for all trade skills.
But seeing how
it appears you are potting at FP, firing sheets are located
at the hut left
of the first inn in East Commons.

Good luck! And if you ever figure out how to make deities be
sure to let us
know.

-----Original Message-----
From: marc.kazen@... [mailto:marc.kazen@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 02, 1999 9:08 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Location of High Quality Firing sheets


From: marc.kazen@...

Does anyone have a definitive list of the locations where I
can buy
supplies? I located the pottery sketches in North Freeport
next to the
bank, and clay in North Freeport in Groflath's Forge shop
(by the Bard
guild). I can't seem to find High Quality Firing Sheets
anywhere? Does
anyone know? Thanks.
